TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 多格式文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows rich text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 控件，用户可以输入和编辑文本。With the control, the user can enter and edit text. 该控件还提供比标准 控件更高级的格式设置功能。The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard control. 可以直接将文本分配给控件，也可以从 rtf 格式或纯文本文件加载文本。Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file. 可以为控件中的文本分配字符和段落格式设置。The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 控件提供了许多属性，可用于将格式设置应用于控件中的任何文本部分。The control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control. 若要更改文本的格式设置，必须首先选择该格式。To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected. 只能为所选文本分配字符和段落格式设置。Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 对所选文本部分进行设置后，在选定内容之后输入的所有文本也会使用相同的设置进行设置，直到选择了更改或控件文档的其他部分。Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected. 利用 属性，您可以将文本设置为粗体或斜体。The property enables you to make text bold or italic. 你还可以使用此属性来更改文本的大小和字体。You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text. 利用 属性，您可以更改文本的颜色。The property enables you to change the color of the text. 若要创建项目符号列表，可以使用 "" 属性。To create bulleted lists you can use the property. 还可以通过设置 ""、"" 和 "" 属性来调整段落格式。You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the , , and properties. 控件提供了提供打开和保存文件的功能的方法。The control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files. 利用 方法，您可以将现有的 RTF 或 ASCII 文本文件加载到控件中。The method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control. 您还可以从已打开的数据流中加载数据。You can also load data from an already opened data stream. 使用 可以将文件保存到 RTF 或 ASCII 文本。The enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text. 与 方法类似，还可以使用 方法保存到打开的数据流。Similar to the method, you can also use the method to save to an open data stream. 控件还提供了用于查找文本字符串的功能。The control also provides features for finding strings of text. 重载 方法，以便在控件的文本中查找两个字符串和特定的字符。The method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control. 还可以将 控件初始化为存储在内存中的数据。You can also initialize the control to data stored in memory. 例如，可以将 属性初始化为包含要显示的文本的字符串，包括用于确定文本格式的 RTF 代码。For example, you can initialize the property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted. 如果控件中的文本包含链接（如指向网站的链接），则可以使用 属性在控件的文本中相应地显示链接。If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the property to display the link appropriately in the control's text. 然后，可以处理 事件以执行与链接关联的任务。You can then handle the event to perform the tasks associated with the link. 属性使你能够保护控件中的文本不被用户操作。The property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user. 使用控件中的受保护文本，您可以处理 事件，以确定用户是否试图修改受保护的文本，并通知用户文本受到保护，或者向用户提供一种标准方法来处理受保护的文本。With protected text in your control, you can handle the event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text. 已使用 控件的应用程序可以轻松地改编为使用 控件。Applications that already use controls can easily be adapted to make use of controls. 但 控件的 控件的64K 字符容量限制相同。However, the control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the control. 通常用于提供文本操作并显示类似于 word 处理应用程序（如 Microsoft Word）的功能。The is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word. > [!NOTE] > 方法无法与 或 事件一起使用。The method does not work with the or events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，该控件将 RTF 文件加载到控件中并搜索单词 "Text" 的第一个实例。The following code example creates a control that loads an RTF file into the control and searches for the first instance of the word "Text." 然后，代码将更改所选文本的字体样式、字号和字体颜色，并将更改保存回原始文件中。The code then changes the font style, font size, and font color of the selected text and saves the changes back to the original file. 示例代码通过将控件添加到其 来完成。The example code finishes by adding the control to its . 此示例要求将示例代码中创建的方法添加到 类，并从窗体的构造函数中调用。This example requires that the method created in the example code is added to a class and called from the constructor of the form. 该示例还要求在 C 驱动器的根目录中创建一个 RTF 文件，其中包含单词 "Text"。The example also requires that an RTF file is created, in the root of the C drive, containing the word "Text." remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用包含要放置到 控件中的项的 控件执行拖放操作。The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a control that contains items to drop into a control. 窗体的构造函数将 属性设置为 `true`，以便在 中执行拖放操作。The constructor of the form sets the property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the . 该示例使用 的 事件通过调用 方法来启动拖动操作。The example uses the event of the to start the drag operation by calling the method. 该示例使用 事件确定要拖动到 中的项是否为有效的数据类型。The example uses the event to determine if an item being dragged into the is a valid data type. 事件执行拖动的项到实际放控件中的当前光标位置在。The event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the control at the current cursor location within the . 此示例要求 和 事件已连接到该示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that the and events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则选择控件中的任何部分文本将选择整个单词。If this property is set to `true`, selecting any part of the text in the control selects the entire word. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 来放大文本、在双击某个单词时自动选择该控件文本中的单词，并在控件的工作区右侧显示边距。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果 控件的宽度较小，则使用此代码将创建一个 ，其中每个字符都显示在其自己的行上。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直显示位置中，单击某个单词的任何部分将选择该单词的所有字符，而不考虑文本垂直显示这一事实。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求您具有一个包含名为 `richTextBox1`的 控件的窗体。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将项目符号样式应用于文本段落，请将 属性设置为 `true`，然后将 属性设置为文本应缩进的像素数。To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the property to `true` and then set the property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented. 段落将应用项目符号样式，并在项目符号后指定的缩进量。The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet. 此属性只会影响控件文本中的当前段落和项目符号项列表中当前选定的项目符号。This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items. 若要将不同的缩进级别应用到项目符号项目的整个列表，必须先选择项目符号项的所有文本，然后才能设置 "" 属性。To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有 、、和 属性的 属性在 控件中创建项目符号列表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 此示例要求在窗体上创建一个名为 `richTextBox1` 控件。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来确定剪贴板的当前内容是否为指定的剪贴板数据格式，然后才允许用户将该信息粘贴到 控件中。You can use this method to determine whether the current contents of the Clipboard are in a specified Clipboard data format before enabling the user to paste the information into the control. 例如，可以为粘贴命令 的 事件创建事件处理程序，并使用此方法来确定是否应根据剪贴板中的数据类型启用粘贴 。For example, you could create an event handler for a event of a paste command and use this method to determine whether the paste should be enabled based on the type of data in the Clipboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将位图粘贴到 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 从文件打开位图后，该示例使用 方法将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最后，此示例将检索 对象的格式，使用 方法验证该格式是否可以粘贴到 控件中，然后使用 方法粘贴数据。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, uses the method to verify that the format can be pasted into the control, and then uses the method to paste the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的 方法从 `characterSet` 参数中指定的字符列表中搜索某个字符的第一个实例，并返回该字符的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，传递包含字符 "Q" 的字符数组。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控件包含文本 "Quick 棕色 Fox"，则 方法返回的值为4。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 搜索中的大写字符和小写字符被视为不同的值。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 如果该属性返回一个负值，则在该控件的内容中找不到搜索的字符。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用此方法在控件内搜索一组字符。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 此版本的 方法要求搜索包含在控件中的整个文档中的字符。This version of the method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters. 如果找到了方法的 `characterSet` 参数中提供的字符列表中的字符，则此方法返回的值是该字符在控件中的位置的从零开始的索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control. 确定字符的位置时，方法会将空格视为字符。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 `text` 参数中搜索传递给方法的字符 的内容。The following code example searches the contents of a for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter. 如果在 中找到 `text` 数组的内容，则该方法将返回找到的值的索引;否则，它将返回-1。If the contents of the `text` array are found in the , the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1. 该示例要求将此方法放在包含名为 `richTextBox1` 的 控件的 的类中，并将一个名为 `button1`的 控件连接到该示例中定义的 `Click` 事件处理程序。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a control named `richTextBox1` and a control, named `button1`, that is connected to the `Click` event handler defined in the example. 您可以使用此方法在控件内搜索一组字符。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 如果找到方法的 `characterSet` 参数中提供的字符列表中的字符，则此方法返回的值是该字符在控件中的位置的从零开始的索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero based index of the character's position in the control. 确定字符的位置时，方法会将空格视为字符。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. 利用此版本的 方法，你可以通过为 `start` 和 `end` 参数指定值，在控件中的文本范围内搜索字符集。This version of the method enables you to search for a character set from a range of text in the control by specifying a value for the `start` and `end` parameters. 如果 `start` 参数的值为零，则指示应从控件文档的开头开始搜索。A value of zero for the `start` parameter indicates that the search should start from the beginning of the control's document. `end` 参数的-1 值指示搜索应在控件中的文本的末尾结束。A -1 value for the `end` parameter indicates that the search should end at the end of the text within the control. 您可以使用此版本的 方法将搜索范围缩小到控件中特定范围的文本，以避免搜索文档中不太重要的文档区域。You can use this version of the method to narrow your search to a specific range of text within the control to avoid searching areas of the document that are not important to the needs of your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索在 `str` 参数中指定的文本，并返回该搜索字符串在控件中的第一个字符的位置。The method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search string within the control. 如果该属性返回一个负值，则在该控件的内容中找不到正在搜索的文本字符串。If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control. 您可以使用此方法来创建可提供给控件用户的搜索功能。You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control. 你还可以使用此方法搜索要替换为特定格式的文本。You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format. 例如，如果用户在控件中输入了日期，则可以使用 方法在使用控件的 方法之前，搜索文档中的所有日期并将其替换为适当的格式。For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the method of the control. 使用此版本的 方法，你可以指定可用于扩展或缩小搜索范围的选项。With this version of the method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search. 您可以指定选项，使您能够匹配搜索词的大小写或搜索整个单词而不是部分单词。You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words. 通过在 `options` 参数中指定 `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` 枚举，可以从文档的底部搜索文本，而不是默认的从上到下的搜索方法。By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. 利用此版本的 方法，还可以通过选择控件文本中的特定起始位置来缩小文本搜索范围。This version of the method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific starting position within the control's text. 此功能可以让你避免可能已搜索的文本或要搜索的特定文本是否不存在。This feature can enable you to avoid text that might have already been searched or where the specific text you are searching for is known not to exist. 如果在 `options` 参数中指定了 `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` 值，则 `start` 参数的值将指示反向搜索在使用此版本的 方法时从文档底部开始的位置。When the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` value is specified in the `options` parameter, the value of the `start` parameter indicates the position where the reverse search will end since the search will start at the bottom of the document when using this version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 接受作为参数的 `string` 的 方法无法找到包含在 内多行文本上的文本。The methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the . 执行这样的搜索将返回值为负1（-1）。Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 的全部内容中搜索传递到该方法的 text 参数的搜索字符串的第一个实例。The following code example searches the entire contents of a for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method. 搜索起始位置由方法的 start 参数指定。The search starting location is specified by the start parameter of the method. 如果在 中找到了搜索字符串，则该方法将返回找到的文本的第一个字符的索引位置，并突出显示找到的文本;否则，它将返回值-1。If the search string is found in the , the method returns the index location of the first character of the found text and highlights the found text; otherwise, it returns a value of -1. 该示例还在搜索中指定了与指定的搜索字符串匹配的选项。The example also specifies options in the search to match the case of the specified search string. 该示例要求将此方法放在包含名为 `richTextBox1` 的 的类中。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a named `richTextBox1`. 您可以使用此示例来执行 "查找下一个" 操作类型。You can use this example to perform a "Find Next" type of operation. 找到搜索文本的实例后，可以通过将 `start` 参数的值更改为在当前匹配位置之外的位置搜索来查找文本的其他实例。Once an instance of the search text has been found, you can find other instances of the text by changing the value of the `start` parameter to search at a location beyond the position of the current match. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索在 `str` 参数中指定的文本，并返回该搜索字符串在控件中的第一个字符的位置。The method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search 您可以使用此方法来创建可提供给控件用户的搜索功能。You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control. 你还可以使用此方法搜索要替换为特定格式的文本。You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format. 例如，如果用户在控件中输入了日期，则可以使用 方法在使用控件的 方法之前，搜索文档中的所有日期并将其替换为适当的格式。For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you can use the method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the method of the control. 使用此版本的 方法，你可以指定可用于扩展或缩小搜索范围的选项。With this version of the method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search. 您可以指定选项，使您能够匹配搜索词的大小写或搜索整个单词而不是部分单词。You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words. 通过在 `options` 参数中指定 `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` 枚举，可以从文档的底部搜索文本，而不是默认的从上到下的搜索方法。By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. 此版本的 方法还使你可以通过选择控件文本中的特定开始和结束位置来缩小文本搜索范围。This version of the method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific start and end position within the control's text. 此功能可让你将搜索范围限制为控件文本的特定部分。This feature can enable you to limit the search range to a specific section of the control's text. 如果为 `end` 参数分配了负一（-1）的值，则该方法将搜索到 中文本的末尾，以便进行常规搜索。If a value of negative one (-1) is assigned to the `end` parameter, the method will search until the end of the text in the for normal searches. 对于反向搜索，分配给 `end` 参数的值为负1（-1）表示将从文本末尾（底部）搜索文本到 `start` 参数定义的位置。For reverse searches, a value of negative one (-1) assigned to the `end` parameter indicates that text will be searched from the end of text (bottom) to the position defined by `start` parameter. 当 `start` 和 `end` 参数的值提供相同的值时，将在整个控件中搜索正常搜索。When the `start` and `end` parameters are provided the same value the entire control is searched for normal searches. 对于反向搜索，会搜索整个控件，但搜索从文档底部开始，并搜索到文档顶部。For a reverse search, the entire control is searched but the search begins at the bottom of the document and searches to the top of the document. > [!NOTE] > 接受作为参数的 `string` 的 方法无法找到包含在 内多行文本上的文本。The methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the . 执行这样的搜索将返回值为负1（-1）。Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 中搜索传递到该方法的 `searchText` 参数的搜索字符串的第一个实例的部分文本。The following code example searches a section of text in a for the first instance of a search string passed into the `searchText` parameter of the method. 要在控件中搜索文本的范围由方法的 `searchStart` 和 `searchEnd` 参数指定。The range to search for text within the control is specified by the `searchStart` and `searchEnd` parameters of the method. 如果在 中找到了搜索字符串，则该方法将返回找到的文本的第一个字符的索引位置，并突出显示找到的文本;否则，它将返回值-1。If the search string is found in the , the method placed in the class of a that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. 找到搜索字符串的第一个实例后，可以使用此示例查找文本中的其他实例。After the first instance of the search string has been found, you can use this example to find other instances in the text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与 `pt` 参数中指定位置最接近的字符索引。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是控件中的文本的从零开始的索引，其中包括空格。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用此方法，通过将鼠标坐标传递到此方法来确定用户在文本中的位置。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 如果要在用户将鼠标指针悬停在控件文本中的单词上时执行任务，这会很有用。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 方法与 方法一起使用，以便在 控件中搜索特定字符串，并在 控件中显示找到的字符串所在位置的字符索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the method to search for a specific string within a control and display the character index where the found string is located within the control. 此示例在控件内容内搜索 "棕色" 一词，并返回找到搜索字符串的字符索引位置。The example searches for the word "brown" within the contents of the control and returns the character index position where the search string is found. 此示例要求您具有一个窗体，该窗体包含一个名为 `richTextBox1` 的包含文本的 控件。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1` that contains text. 它还要求示例中的代码连接到 的 事件。It also requires that the code in the example is connected to the event of the . [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够根据在方法的 `index` 参数中指定的字符索引来确定行号。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的第一行文本返回值零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回索引字符位于控件中的物理行号。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果控件中第一个逻辑文本行的一部分包装到下一行，则在指定字符索引处的字符已包装到第二个物理行时， 方法返回1。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果 设置为 `false`，则行的任何部分都不会换到下一步，并且对于指定的字符索引，该方法将返回0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用此方法来确定特定字符索引所在的行。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用 方法搜索文本后，可以获取搜索结果所在位置的字符索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以使用 方法返回的字符索引来调用此方法，以确定找到该单词的行。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. 在某些情况下，当 `index` 参数为无效值时， 不会引发异常。In certain cases, does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value. 例如：For example: - 如果 `index` 参数 或为-1， 将返回0。If the `index` parameter is or -1, returns 0. - 如果 `index` 参数是文本长度或 ， 返回文本的最后一行的行号，这不一定与 `Lines.Length-1`相同，具体取决于 属性的值。If the `index` parameter is the text length or , returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the property. 在这些情况下，请在调用 之前验证输入。In these cases, validate the input before calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果 `index` 参数中指定的字符索引超出了控件内包含的可用行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `RichTextBox1`的 控件的窗体中，该控件名为 `Button1`，两个文本框分别名为 `TextBox1` 和 `TextBox2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `RichTextBox1`, a button named `Button1` and two text boxes named `TextBox1` and `TextBox2`. 当示例运行时，请在 `TextBox2` 中输入搜索字符串，并单击按钮以获取搜索结果。When the example is running, enter a search string in `TextBox2` and click the button to get search results. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为此事件创建事件处理程序，以处理已在控件内单击的链接。You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control. 通过使用提供给事件处理程序的信息，您可以确定在文档中单击的链接。Using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，链接显示为文本并且不可单击。By default, links are displayed as text and are not clickable. 若要使它们可单击，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To make them clickable set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含 事件的事件处理程序。The following code example contains an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序将处理 控件文档内的链接单击，并启动默认浏览器的实例（使用 方法），并显示已单击的链接的页面。The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked. 此示例要求事件处理程序已连接到 的 事件。This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the event for a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载带有 方法的文件时，所加载文件的内容将替换 控件的全部内容。When loading a file with the method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the control. 这将导致 和 属性的值发生更改。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 您可以使用此方法将以前创建的文本或 RTF 文档加载到控件中进行操作。You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation. 如果要保存该文件，可以使用 方法。If you want to save the file, you can use the method. > [!NOTE] > 使用此版本的 方法时，如果加载的文件不是 RTF 文档，则会出现异常。With this version of the method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur. 若要加载不同类型的文件（如 ASCII 文本文件），请使用此方法的其他版本，该方法接受从 枚举中的值作为参数。To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. > [!NOTE] > 在为 创建句柄之前， 方法将不会打开文件。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 请确保在调用 方法之前创建控件的句柄。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 控件中打开一个 RTF 文件。The following code example opens an RTF file into the control. 该示例使用 类来显示一个对话框，用于向用户请求该文件。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the file from the user. 然后，代码会加载该文件（假定它是一个 RTF 文档文件）。The code then loads that file assuming that it is an RTF document file. 如果文件不是，则示例代码将引发异常。If the file is not, the example code will throw an exception. 此示例要求将代码放置在具有名为 `richTextBox1` 控件的 类中。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为0时，可在控件中输入的文本的最大长度为 64 KB。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters. 此属性通常在 用于显示单行格式文本格式（RTF）文本时使用。This property is typically used when the is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text. 您可以使用此属性来限制控件中为邮政编码和电话号码等值输入的文本长度，或限制在数据库中输入数据时输入的文本长度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以将在控件中输入的文本限制为数据库中对应字段的最大长度。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，你可以将 属性的值设置为长度大于 属性指定的值的值。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 此属性仅影响运行时输入到控件中的文本。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定分配给 控件的文本是否大于赋给 属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if text being assigned to a control is larger than the value assigned to the property. 如果文本不大，该示例将使用 属性将文本分配给控件。If the text is not larger, the example uses the property to assign the text to the control. 此示例要求已将名为 `richTextBox1`的 控件添加到窗体，并使用提供给要粘贴到控件中的参数的文本调用该示例中的方法。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to a form and that the method in the example is called with text supplied to the parameter that is to be pasted into the control. 该示例还要求 属性已设置为值，以将文本输入限制到 中。The example also requires that the property has been set to a value to limit text entry into the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将剪贴板中的数据粘贴到控件中。You can use this method to paste data from the clipboard into the control. 此版本的 方法不同于 方法，因为它允许您仅粘贴指定剪贴板格式的文本。This version of the method is different from the method as it enables you to paste only text in a specified Clipboard format. 您可以使用 方法来确定剪贴板中的数据是否为指定的剪贴板格式。You can use the method to determine whether the data within the Clipboard is in the specified Clipboard format. 然后，可以调用此版本的 方法，以确保用适当的数据格式进行粘贴操作。You can then call this version of the method to ensure that the paste operation is made with the appropriate data format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将位图粘贴到 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 从文件打开位图后，该示例使用 方法将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最后，此示例将检索 对象的格式，验证该格式是否可以粘贴到 控件中，并使用 方法粘贴数据。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, verifies that the format can be pasted into the control, and uses the method to paste the data. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Protected As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户尝试修改控件中受保护的文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在应用程序中为此事件创建事件处理程序，以确定用户是否试图修改控件中已标记为受保护的文本。You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has attempted to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control. 事件处理程序可用于通知用户，用户试图修改的文本是受保护的，或者显示一个对话框，使用户能够对文本进行适当的更改。The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is attempting to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text. 例如，如果受保护的区域是日期，则可以显示一个对话框，用户可以通过该对话框选择可应用于控件文本的日期。For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to choose a date which can then be applied to the text of the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `RichTextBox1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#543](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#543)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#543](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#543)]

summary.span: 重新应用控件中上次撤消的操作。

span.span: Reapplies the last operation that was undone in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 然后，你可以使用 方法将上次撤消操作重新应用到该控件。You can then use the method to reapply the last undo operation to the control. 利用 方法，你可以确定用户已撤消的上一个操作是否可以重新应用到控件。The method enables you to determine whether the last operation the user has undone can be reapplied to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性和 方法，将重做操作限制为除删除文本以外的任何操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties, and the method, to restrict a redo operation to any action except the deletion of text. 此示例要求您具有一个包含 控件的窗体，并在调用此示例中的代码之前已执行并撤消了 中的操作。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control and that an operation within the has been performed and undone before the code in this example is called. summary.span: 获取当调用 方法后，可以重新应用到控件的操作名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the action that can be reapplied to the control when the method is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示发出对 方法的调用后执行的操作名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the action that will be performed when a call to the method is made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性返回一个空字符串（""），则没有可重新应用到该控件的操作。If this property returns an empty string (""), there is no operation available to reapply to the control. 您可以使用此方法来确定 控件中撤消的最后一个操作，然后在调用 方法时重新应用到该控件。You can use this method to determine the last action undone in the control that can then be reapplied to the control when a call to the method is made. 您可以通过使用 属性来确定是否有任何操作重新应用到控件。You can determine whether there are any operations to be reapplied to the control by using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 属性和 方法，将重做操作限制为除删除文本以外的任何操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties, and the method, to restrict a redo operation to any action except the deletion of text. 此示例要求您具有一个包含 控件的窗体，并在调用此示例中的代码之前已执行并撤消了 中的操作。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control and that an operation within the has been performed and undone before the code in this example is called. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件内单个文本行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of a single line of text within the control.

value.span: 控件中单个文本行的大小（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The size, in pixels, of a single line of text in the control.

value.span: 默认值为零。

span.span: The default is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控件中输入大于零的值，则会在控件中将不可见边距置于控件左侧指定的像素数。When a value greater than zero is entered into the control, a nonvisible margin is placed in the control at the specified number of pixels from the left side of the control. 如果输入的内容超出此边距，则将其置于控件中的下一行文本上。Any text that is entered that extends beyond this margin is placed on the next line of text in the control. 此属性会影响当前输入到控件中的所有文本，以及在设置该属性后输入到控件中的任何其他文本。This property affects all text currently entered into the control as well as any additional text entered into the control after the property is set. 您可以使用此属性为输入 控件中的所有文本指定最大线条宽度。You can use this property to specify a maximum line width for all text entered into a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 来放大文本、在双击某个单词时自动选择该控件文本中的单词，并在控件的工作区右侧显示边距。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果 控件的宽度较小，则使用此代码将创建一个 ，其中每个字符都显示在其自己的行上。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直显示位置中，单击某个单词的任何部分将选择该单词的所有字符，而不考虑文本垂直显示这一事实。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求您具有一个包含名为 `richTextBox1`的 控件的窗体。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值小于零。

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本，包括所有 RTF 格式代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the control, including all rich text format (RTF) codes.

value.span: RTF 格式的控件文本。

span.span: The text of the control in RTF format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性将 RTF 格式的文本放入控件中以便显示，或使用在控件的文本中定义的指定 RTF 格式设置控件的文本。You can use this property to place RTF formatted text into the control for display or to extract the text of the control with the specified RTF formatting defined in the text of the control. 此属性通常在您将来自其他 RTF 源（如 Microsoft Word 或 Windows WordPad）的 RTF 文本分配给控件时使用。This property is typically used when you are assigning RTF text from another RTF source, such as Microsoft Word or Windows WordPad, to the control. 如果在运行时更改 属性，则只保留未设置格式的原始文本。If you change the property at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. 有关 RTF 代码，请参阅[格式文本格式（rtf）规范1.6 版](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/office2000/aa140277(v=office.10))。For the RTF codes, see [Rich Text Format (RTF) Specification, version 1.6](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/office2000/aa140277(v=office.10)).

summary.span: 将 的内容保存到 RTF 格式文件。

span.span: Saves the contents of the to a rich text format (RTF) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 方法，你可以将控件的全部内容保存到可由其他程序（如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板）使用的 RTF 文件中。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果传递到 `path` 参数的文件名在指定的目录中已存在，则将在不通知的情况下覆盖该文件。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 您可以使用 方法将文件的内容加载到 中。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . > [!NOTE] > 若要将控件的内容保存到另一种类型的文件格式（例如 ASCII 文本），请使用此方法的其他版本，该方法接受从 枚举中的值作为参数。To save the contents of the control to a different type of file format such as ASCII text, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件的内容保存到 RTF 文件中。The following code example saves the contents of a control to an RTF file. 该示例使用 类显示一个对话框，该对话框用于请求用户、要保存的文件的路径和文件名。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request from the user, the path and filename of the file to save. 然后，代码保存文件，假定内容为 rtf 格式。The code then saves the file assuming the content is in rich text format. 如果文件已存在，则会自动覆盖它。If the file already exists, it is automatically overwritten. 此示例要求将代码放置在具有名为 `richTextBox1` 控件的 类中。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的 方法使你能够将控件的全部内容保存到已打开的数据流。This version of the method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to the data stream that is already opened. 然后，数据流可以将信息保存到文件。The data stream can then save the information to a file. 您可以使用 方法将文件的内容加载到 中。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . 此版本的 方法还允许您指定将发送到 对象的信息的数据格式。This version of the method also enables you to specify a data format of the information that will be sent to the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和 方法与流一起使用。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示了如何使用 、、和 成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是一个完整的示例，可以在将其复制到项目时运行。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 方法，你可以将控件的全部内容保存到可由其他程序（如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板）使用的 RTF 文件中。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果传递到 `path` 参数的文件名在指定的目录中已存在，则将在不通知的情况下覆盖该文件。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 您可以使用 方法将文件的内容加载到 中。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . 此版本的 方法使你可以指定要将控件的内容保存到的文件类型。This version of the method enables you to specify a file type to save the contents of the control to. 您可以使用此功能来确保基于控件的内容以正确的格式保存文件。You can use this feature to ensure that the file is saved in the proper format based on the contents of the control. 例如，如果文档的字体样式或着色没有差别，则可以通过将 `fileType` 参数设置为 `RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`，将该文件另存为 ASCII 文本文件。For example, if your document has no differences in font style or coloring, you can save the file as an ASCII text file by setting the `fileType` parameter to `RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 的内容保存到 ASCII 文本文件中。The following code example saves the contents of the into an ASCII text file. 该示例使用 类来显示一个对话框，用于请求用户的路径和文件名。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the path and file name from the user. 然后，代码将控件的内容保存到该文件。The code then saves the contents of the control to that file. 该示例使用 方法的此版本来指定将文件另存为 ASCII 文本文件，而不是标准 rtf 格式。The example uses this version of the method to specify that the file be saved as an ASCII text file instead of the standard rich text format. 此示例要求将代码放置在具有名为 `richTextBox1` 控件的 类中。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性，可以向 控件的用户提供水平滚动条和垂直滚动条，以便在控件的物理尺寸之外滚动文本。This property enables you to provide horizontal and vertical scroll bars to the user of the control to enable scrolling text within the control that is outside of the physical dimensions of the control. 您还可以使用此属性从控件中删除滚动条，以限制滚动控件的内容。You can also use this property to remove scroll bars from the control to restrict scrolling the contents of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `true`，无论 属性的值如何，都不会显示水平滚动条。Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the is `true`, regardless of the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够获取控件中选定的文本，包括 RTF 格式代码。This property enables you to obtain the selected text in the control, including the RTF formatting codes. 您可以使用此属性从控件复制文本，使用格式设置完成，并将文本粘贴到接受 RTF 格式文本的其他应用程序（例如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板）中。You can use this property to copy text from your control, complete with formatting, and paste the text in other applications that accept RTF formatted text, such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 若要获取所选文本，而不使用 RTF 格式代码，请使用 属性。To get the selected text, without RTF formatting codes, use the property. 如果当前未选择任何文本，则在插入点处插入此属性中指定的文本。If no text is currently selected, the text specified in this property is inserted at the insertion point. 如果选择文本，则分配给此属性的任何文本都将替换选定文本。If text is selected, any text assigned to this property replaces the selected text.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用到当前选定内容或插入点的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment to apply to the current selection or insertion point.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控件中未选择任何段落，则设置此属性会将对齐设置应用到插入点所在的段落以及在具有对齐属性设置的段落之后创建的段落。If no paragraph is selected in the control, setting this property applies the alignment setting to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears as well as to paragraphs created after the paragraph that has the alignment property setting. 例如，如果 控件中有两个段，并且插入点位于第二个段落中。For example, if there are two paragraphs in a control and the insertion point is located within the second paragraph. 如果将 属性设置为 `HorizontalAlignment.Center`，则插入点的段落将在控件中居中。If you set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`, the paragraph at the insertion point will be centered within the control. 如果在第二个段落之后创建了第三个段落，它也将与控件的中心对齐。If a third paragraph is created after the second paragraph, it also is aligned to the center of the control. 如果在设置属性时在控件内进行了选择，则将根据此属性设置对齐所有选定段落。If a selection is made within the control when the property is set, all paragraphs selected are aligned based on this property setting. 您可以使用此属性来对齐在 中创建的文档中的段落。You can use this property to align the paragraphs in a document being created in the . 例如，如果希望文档中的所有段落都居中，则可以选择控件中的所有段落并将 属性设置为 `HorizontalAlignment.Center`。For example, if you want all paragraphs in a document to be centered, you can select all the paragraphs in the control and set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`. > [!NOTE] > 当所选文本包含多个具有混合对齐方式的段落时， 返回 `SelectionAlignment.Left`。 returns `SelectionAlignment.Left` when the text selection contains multiple paragraphs with mixed alignment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对齐 中的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to align text within the . 此示例要求已将名为 `richTextBox1` 控件添加到窗体中。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未选择任何文本，则将项目符号样式应用于当前插入点和用户在插入点后输入的所有段落。If no text is selected, the bullet style is applied to the current insertion point and to all paragraphs that the user enters after the insertion point. 项目符号样式应用于控件的文本，直到移动插入点或用户在空的项目符号项上按 Enter 键。The bullet style is applied to the text of the control until the insertion point is moved or when the user presses the Enter key on an empty bullet item. 如果在设置此属性时在控件内选择文本，则所选文本中的所有段落都将转换为项目符号列表中的项目符号项。If text is selected within the control when this property is set, all paragraphs within the selected text are converted into bulleted items in the bulleted list. 您可以使用此属性在 控件中创建的文档中创建项目符号列表。You can use this property to create bulleted lists within the documents you create in the control. 利用 属性，您可以指定项目符号与项目符号项文本之间的缩进量。The property enables you to specify the amount of indentation to apply between the bullet and the bulleted item's text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用带有 、和 属性的 属性在 控件中创建项目符号列表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 此示例要求在窗体上创建一个名为 `richTextBox1` 控件。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以为此事件创建事件处理程序，以确定用户更改控件中的文本选择的时间。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the user has changed text selection within the control. 此事件的事件处理程序可用于使文本保持选定状态，直到用户完成了应用程序内的任务。An event handler for this event can be used to keep text selected until the user has completed a task within the application. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `RichTextBox1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的文本是显示在基线上、作为上标还是作为基线下方的下标。

span.span: Gets or sets whether text in the control appears on the baseline, as a superscript, or as a subscript below the baseline.

value.span: 指定字符偏移量的数字。

span.span: A number that specifies the character offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须介于-2000 和2000之间。The value of this property must be between -2000 and 2000. 如果将此属性设置为零，则文本将显示在基线上。If this property is set to zero, the text appears on the baseline. 如果是正数，则该数字指定在基线上方引发文本选择所依据的像素数。If it is a positive number, the number specifies the number of pixels by which to raise the text selection above the baseline. 如果为负数，此数字指定选定文本所选的像素数。If it is a negative number, this number specifies the number of pixels by which to subscript the text selection. 您可以使用此属性将文本指定为上标或下标。You can use this property to specify text as superscript or subscript. 如果未选择任何文本，则偏移量将应用于当前插入点和用户在插入点之后键入的所有文本。If no text is selected, the offset is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that the user types after the insertion point. 在将属性更改为其他值或将插入点移动到控件内的其他部分之前，将一直使用字符偏移量。The character offset applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果在控件中选择文本，则选定文本和在选择文本后输入的任何文本都将应用此属性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用此属性为此类应用程序创建与数学表达式相同的上标和下标文本。You can use this property to create superscript and subscript text for such applications as mathematical expressions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在 中指定上标和下标文本。The following code example demonstrates how to specify superscript and subscript text within the using the property. 此示例要求已将名为 `richTextBox1` 控件添加到窗体中。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前选定文本具有多个指定的颜色，则此属性将返回 `Color.Empty`。If the current text selection has more than one color specified, this property returns `Color.Empty`. 如果当前未选择任何文本，则在此属性中指定的文本颜色将应用于当前插入点和插入点之后键入到控件中的所有文本。If no text is currently selected, the text color specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 在将属性更改为其他颜色或将插入点移动到控件内的其他部分之前，将应用文本颜色设置。The text color setting applies until the property is changed to a different color or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果在控件中选择文本，则选定文本和在选择文本后输入的任何文本都将应用此属性的值。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 您可以使用此属性更改 中文本的颜色。You can use this property to change the color of text in the . 若要使控件中的文本为粗体，请使用 属性分配一个指定了粗体字样式的新字体。To make text bold in the control, use the property to assign a new font that has the bold font style specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向用户显示 ，以指定当前选定文本或在 控件中的当前插入点后输入的文本的颜色。The following code example displays a to the user to specify a color for the current text selection or text entered after the current insertion point in a control. 此示例要求将示例中定义的方法添加到 类，该类包含一个名为 `richTextBox1`的 控件。This example requires that the method defined in the example is added to a class that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值可以介于1/64 （0.015625）和64.0 （不含）之间。The value of this property can be between 1/64 (0.015625) and 64.0, not inclusive. 如果值为1.0，则表示不对控件应用缩放。A value of 1.0 indicates that no zoom is applied to the control. 当文档包含 TrueType 字体时，缩放功能以最佳方式执行。The zoom feature performs optimally when the document contains TrueType fonts. 如果在控件的文档中使用了非 TrueType 字体，则 属性将使用最接近的整数值。When a font that is not TrueType is used within the document of the control, the property will use the nearest whole number value. 您可以使用此属性使 控件的用户可以放大到文档中因太小而无法查看或紧缩视图的部分，以便能够在屏幕上查看更多文档。You can use this property to enable the user of the control to zoom into sections of the documentation that are too small to view or to condense the view to enable more of the document to be viewed on screen. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 来放大文本、在双击某个单词时自动选择该控件文本中的单词，并在控件的工作区右侧显示边距。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果 控件的宽度较小，则使用此代码将创建一个 ，其中每个字符都显示在其自己的行上。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直显示位置中，单击某个单词的任何部分将选择该单词的所有字符，而不考虑文本垂直显示这一事实。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求您具有一个包含名为 `richTextBox1`的 控件的窗体。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的缩放因子不在允许的范围内。

span.span: The specified zoom factor did not fall within the permissible range.
